titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3146) to clarify certain restrictions on distribution of advertisements and other information concerning lotteries and similar activities.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-625.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/17/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3146 (lottery advertising).
